--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> how about engulf?

That's sounds . . interesting.

I like the idea of two small slime combining to form a medium slime or 
a small slime combining with a medium slime to form a large one.

I would like for slime to have a really potent attack.  They are 
already one of the best defensive characters in the game.

So, slime aren't the most popular character.  Next week it's orcs and 
archers. (Note: when we do finish all the non-promoted characters, 
I'll open up time for new characters that aren't promotions of 
existing characters)  In two weeks, it's barbarians and mages.
